Text:
...is an IMAGE EDITOR for Mac - except once again the uploader is too fucking lazy to say so!

if you can take the time to make a torrent then surely to Christ,Allah,Mohammed or whoever you have the time to include a description! Lazy Bollocks!

http://www.flyingmeat.com/acorn/
lol sorry for the lazy description bjorn. I just assumed that if people were looking for Acorn for Mac, it's probably because they already know what it is.

I was expecting a fucking Oak Tree! Drag Acorn to planter and watch it grow!!!

I've been round torrent practically since they came into being (remember abc on Windose as one of the first easy to use clients)-- been round Mac since 2007 and I have never heard of this app.. That is why a description never goes amiss.

I believe this is quite basic mut might down it and take a look at it all the same,,, so thx at lease for seeding it unlike some fuckers in this joint I could mention... who simply upload a torrent, turn off their machine and fuck off! Wankers!
